document_data.caption: [[Lich]] [[Azimer]] welcomes adventurers to [[Myth Drannor]]'s [[School of Wizardry]].
document_data.title: Into the Forgotten Realms
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"Into the Forgotten Realms"''' is a tournament adventure for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 1{{st}} edition, designed by [[Ed Greenwood]] and polished in [[Dragon magazine 95]].{{drsup|95/Into the Forgotten Realms}}
document_data.Synopsis: A band of adventurers from across the [[Dalelands]] were sent to the ruins of the [[School of Wizardry]] in [[Myth Drannor]] to gather powerful magics lost in the destroyed City of Song, before the evil [[Lashan Aumersair|Lord Lashan]] of [[Scardale]] could claim them first. However, the ruins were not as abandoned as most thought. The School of Wizardry was still under control of its old Master, the now utterly insane [[lich]] [[Azimer]].
